title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data for a series, the software does not display a friendly error message.
EB: When there is no data for a series, the software should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a chart and set the data definition.
2. Select a column that does not have any data.
